title: Red Tracker Bug?
body: I'm having trouble seeing the full red tracker page. It loads some new messages, and then cuts them off immediately. Do you guys know why I may not be able to see all the Red Tracker threads?

replies.body: It's a script we're running to remove our posts from H&S, that way players can view other comments from Rioters outside of Support.  That change you're seeing is the script organizing it for you.  :D

Is there a way to change settings to see that? I like to keep up with the kind of support questions that come up so that if I have a problem and recognize it from boards I already have the answer without having to open a ticket.
I take it back, it looks like we can use a scriptless version.  Try out this [scriptless Red Tracker in testing.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/redtracker?test)
Sweet, that looks like it works. Thanks so much for the tool in general. Lots of noise on boards, being able to see direct Riot responses to stuff is super helpful.
I really appreciate that!  There's no current way to keep it on the tracker now.  The other way could be to bookmark our profiles to keep in touch with our posts.  Sorry!
